CFM.synopsis: After meeting Karlach and choosing whether to keep her alive or kill her, Mizora appears in camp to turn Wyll into a devil or reward him with a new power.
CFM.how_to_trigger: Initiate Karlach's recruitment with Wyll in party or as avatar, then visit camp once scene is over.

CFM_22.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wyll enters the camp, and is taken aback. A diabolical circle has begun to outline itself on the ground in front of him.

CFM_36.speaker: Mizora
CFM_36.text: I prefer 'advocate'. Has a nice ring to it.

CFM_165.speaker: Mizora
CFM_165.text: You've been a bad boy, Wyll. I'd say your leash needs a yank.
CFM_165.context: CinematicNodeContext: Mizora makes a yanking motion in Wyll's direction as if pulling a leash when saying 'yank.' Wyll holds his hands to his throat.

CFM_58.speaker: Mizora
CFM_58.text: We had a deal. But Karlach's still breathing.

CFM_49.speaker: Mizora
CFM_49.text: And a good handler knows when her pup needs correction. To wit:

CFM_187.speaker: Wyll
CFM_187.text: Do whatever you want with me. But leave my friends alone.

CFM_45.speaker: Mizora
CFM_45.text: Don't worry. A good handler disciplines only her own pets. To wit:

CFM_101.speaker: Narrator
CFM_101.text: *You burn in the fires of Avernus; the lightning storms of Dis strike your flesh. Your soul passes through each layer of the Hells, gaining their essence - and their torment.*
CFM_101.context: CinematicNodeContext: Fire roars around Wyll. For a moment he is hidden behind the flames

CFM_63.speaker: Wyll
CFM_63.text: By the gods, what have you done to me?

CFM_46.speaker: Wyll
CFM_46.text: Interesting. I've never grown horns before...

CFM_32.speaker: Mizora
CFM_32.text: And that's not the half of it.

CFM_18.speaker: Mizora
CFM_18.text: Karlach. Keep an eye on him, would you?

CFM_121.speaker: Mizora
CFM_121.text: I'll be keeping mine on you.

CFM_83.speaker: Mizora
CFM_83.text: Oh - and Wyll? Don't forget. Our pact still stands. Ta-ta!

CFM_2.speaker: Mizora
CFM_2.text: And do mind your messes, Wyll. I won't always be there to clean them up.

CFM_106.speaker: Wyll
CFM_106.text: A devil, huh? Not much of a punishment - more like a favour.

CFM_125.speaker: Mizora
CFM_125.text: A matter of perspective, I'm sure you'll agree.

CFM_62.speaker: Wyll
CFM_62.text: Do your worst. I'm not afraid of you.

CFM_171.speaker: Wyll
CFM_171.text: You said my targets were monsters. But Karlach's no monster.

CFM_145.speaker: Mizora
CFM_145.text: How precious. The little pupster's found his bark.

CFM_123.speaker: Mizora
CFM_123.text: You've been defiant - and defiance requires discipline. To wit:

CFM_109.speaker: Wyll
CFM_109.text: I'm sorry. I should have obeyed. It won't happen again.

CFM_65.speaker: Mizora
CFM_65.text: What's done is done, Wyll. And a defiant pup needs discipline. To wit:

CFM_16.speaker: Wyll
CFM_16.text: What if I kill Karlach now? Would that make you happy?

CFM_80.speaker: Mizora
CFM_80.text: That ship has long sailed the Styx, Wyll. A defiant pup pays the price. To wit:

CFM_48.speaker: Mizora
CFM_48.text: Catch up. Give you a pat.

CFM_56.speaker: Mizora
CFM_56.text: After all - you've been a very good boy.

CFM_77.speaker: Mizora
CFM_77.text: I say fetch, and you fetch. I say kill a fugitive tiefling, and -

CFM_164.speaker: Mizora
CFM_164.text: Well. I can trust it'll get done.

CFM_138.speaker: Wyll
CFM_138.text: I'm supposed to be hunting devils, not refugees.

CFM_117.speaker: Mizora
CFM_117.text: How precious. The little pupster's found his bark.

CFM_19.speaker: Mizora
CFM_19.text: A nice new power should keep you muzzled.

CFM_7.speaker: Narrator
CFM_7.text: *Somewhere deep inside, a spark is ignited. You are the Hells' fires made flesh.*
CFM_7.context: CinematicNodeContext: Fire roars around Wyll. For a moment he is hidden behind the flames

CFM_71.speaker: Wyll
CFM_71.text: I can't accept your reward. I killed an innocent.

CFM_148.speaker: Wyll
CFM_148.text: Come on. I've earned more than just the one power.

CFM_38.speaker: Mizora
CFM_38.text: Hush, pup. A good warlock knows when not to push his luck.

CFM_92.speaker: Wyll
CFM_92.text: Great. I look forward to my next assignment.

CFM_179.speaker: Wyll
CFM_179.text: I did what you asked. It's time for my reward.

CFM_21.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player enters the camp, and is taken aback. A diabolical circle has begun to outline itself on the ground in front of Wyll.

CFM_93.context: CinematicNodeContext: The diabolical circle completes itself, creating a portal from the Hells. Mizora rises from it and spreads her wings wide. The circle disappears.

CFM_66.speaker: Mizora
CFM_66.context: NodeContext: Grinning. With the voice of a pet owner who caught her dog pooping on the carpet.

CFM_60.speaker: Mizora
CFM_60.text: And you know what happens when you're naughty.

CFM_161.speaker: Karlach
CFM_161.text: Gods damn it. Anyone but her.
CFM_161.context: NodeContext: Very unhappy to see Mizora her. Karlach's first remark on Mizora; best if it has an air of Mizora's power, a slight feeling of fear.

CFM_51.speaker: Narrator
CFM_51.text: *You know this devil. Mizora, one of Zariel's servants, and a powerful devil in her own regard.*

CFM_153.speaker: Player
CFM_153.text: Just who in the Nine Hells are you?

CFM_9.speaker: Mizora
CFM_9.text: Wyll, you absolute stinker! You kept me a secret? Time to let the hellcat out of the bag.
CFM_9.context: CinematicNodeContext: Speaking to Wyll. So *very* patronising.

CFM_20.speaker: Mizora
CFM_20.text: Call me Mizora. I'm Wyll's patron, the fount of his power. My pet's been unruly -

CFM_73.speaker: Mizora
CFM_73.text: - and his leash needs a yank.
CFM_73.context: CinematicNodeContext: Mizora makes a yanking motion in Wyll's direction as if pulling a leash when saying 'yank.' Wyll holds his hands to his throat.

CFM_105.speaker: Mizora
CFM_105.text: We had a deal, Wyll. But Karlach's still breathing.

CFM_142.speaker: Karlach
CFM_142.text: I've taken more pleasant shits than you, Mizora, and at least those can be buried after.

CFM_54.speaker: Mizora
CFM_54.text: That's no kind of talk for a lady. By the way, Karlach -

CFM_100.speaker: Wyll
CFM_100.text: You told me devils only. She's - a tiefling. Not a monster.
CFM_100.context: NodeContext: Speaking as if being choked

CFM_31.speaker: Mizora
CFM_31.text: How precious. The little pupster's found his bark.

CFM_143.speaker: Mizora
CFM_143.text: Karlach meets the criteria by virtue of having no heart.

CFM_181.speaker: Mizora
CFM_181.text: Karlach meets the criteria, pet. Trust me on this.

CFM_160.speaker: Player
CFM_160.text: Get to the point, devil. What do you want?

CFM_98.speaker: Mizora
CFM_98.text: The point? Oh, yes - thanks for the reminder.

CFM_89.speaker: Player
CFM_89.text: If we kill Karlach now, will that get rid of you?

CFM_169.speaker: Mizora
CFM_169.text: Now? Too late, flower. You'll never be rid of me.

CFM_25.speaker: Player
CFM_25.text: You better not lay a damned finger on Karlach.

CFM_47.speaker: Mizora
CFM_47.text: Don't you worry - that ship has long sailed the Styx. But a defiant pup must still pay his price. To wit:

CFM_173.context: CinematicNodeContext: Mizora makes a dramatic 'wiping' motion with her hands. Hellish magic fills the air.

CFM_8.speaker: Narrator
CFM_8.text: *Wyll burns in the fires of Avernus; the lightning storms of Dis strike his flesh. His soul passes through each layer of the Hells, gaining their essence - and their torment.*
CFM_8.context: CinematicNodeContext: Fire roars around Wyll. For a moment he is hidden behind the flames

CFM_33.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wyll looks at himsel in horror as he begins to change form. He turns to a horrific devil. When it is done, he stares at himself in disbelief.

CFM_104.speaker: Wyll
CFM_104.text: What the hells have you done?

CFM_131.speaker: Mizora
CFM_131.text: A promise broken, a price paid. You know the terms.

CFM_170.speaker: Mizora
CFM_170.text: Get used to the new form, pet - there's no going back. Some magic, even I can't undo.

CFM_11.speaker: Mizora
CFM_11.text: Now. Let's see how the Frontiers fare without their precious Blade.

CFM_133.speaker: Mizora
CFM_133.text: Karlach. Keep an eye on him, would you?

CFM_116.speaker: Mizora
CFM_116.text: I'll be keeping mine on you.

CFM_78.speaker: Mizora
CFM_78.text: Keep an eye on him, will you?

CFM_82.speaker: Mizora
CFM_82.text: I'll be keeping mine on you.

CFM_128.speaker: Mizora
CFM_128.text: Oh - and Wyll? Don't forget. Our pact still stands. Ta-ta!

CFM_176.context: CinematicNodeContext: The diabolical circle draws itself under Mizora's feet and she sinks into the hells. The circle dissipates behind her.

CFM_68.speaker: Player
CFM_68.text: Blast it all, Wyll. Why didn't you tell me about her?

CFM_137.speaker: Mizora
CFM_137.text: He's the Blade of Frontiers. 'Devil's plaything' just doesn't have the same ring.

CFM_52.speaker: Player
CFM_52.text: I've heard enough. You're not leaving this place alive.

CFM_135.speaker: Mizora
CFM_135.text: Kill me? I wouldn't recommend it. I die, and Wyll turns to a lemure and gets sucked right down to the Hells.

CFM_5.speaker: Player
CFM_5.text: Why don't you fuck all the way off, Mizora?

CFM_10.speaker: Mizora
CFM_10.text: That's no kind of talk for a lady, Karlach.

CFM_72.speaker: Player
CFM_72.text: Well, well. Aren't you a luscious thing?

CFM_110.speaker: Mizora
CFM_110.text: You flatterer. Why, if I had a warm heart, I'm sure it would be skipping.

CFM_175.speaker: Player
CFM_175.text: Godsdamned devil. Get out of my camp!

CFM_108.speaker: Mizora
CFM_108.text: Now? But I'm just getting comfy.
CFM_108.context: NodeContext: Oh so patronising and slippery

CFM_99.speaker: Mizora
CFM_99.text: Call me Mizora. I'm Wyll's patron, the fount of his power. My pet's been unruly -

CFM_50.speaker: Mizora
CFM_50.text: I prefer 'advocate'. Has a nice ring to it.

CFM_70.speaker: Player
CFM_70.text: That's a nice set of wings. Let me guess: Wyll's patron?

CFM_28.speaker: Mizora
CFM_28.text: Handler's the word, if it's all the same.

CFM_156.speaker: Mizora
CFM_156.text: Wyll, buddy. I thought it was time I drop by the doghouse.
CFM_156.context: NodeContext: Grinning, and so very condescending.

CFM_27.speaker: Wyll
CFM_27.context: NodeContext: Not exactly excited to see Mizora after her sudden appearance in the cmap

CFM_107.speaker: Mizora
CFM_107.text: You haven't introduced me to your friends. Where are your manners?

CFM_136.speaker: Player
CFM_136.text: Call me [GEN_PlayerName_c11eee1e-7815-6143-7233-f2427799fa53]. Now what in the Nine Hells is going on?

CFM_103.speaker: Player
CFM_103.text: Call me [GEN_PlayerName2_85df4a15-4d9b-4f68-0512-d104305d8dac]. Now what in the Nine Hells is going on?

CFM_158.speaker: Mizora
CFM_158.text: Wyll, you absolute stinker! You kept me a secret? Time to let the hellcat out of the bag.

CFM_167.speaker: Player
CFM_167.text: Well, well. Aren't you a luscious thing?

CFM_14.speaker: Mizora
CFM_14.text: You flatterer. Why, if I had a heart, I'm sure it would be skipping.

CFM_79.speaker: Mizora
CFM_79.text: Call me Mizora. I'm Wyll's patron, the fount of his power. Your warlock friend is my puppy -

CFM_84.speaker: Mizora
CFM_84.text: - and he's been a very good boy.
CFM_84.context: NodeContext: Talking about Wyll like you'd talk about a dog.

CFM_119.speaker: Mizora
CFM_119.text: I say fetch, and he'll fetch. I say kill a fugitive tiefling, and -

CFM_185.speaker: Mizora
CFM_185.text: Well. I don't need to tell you.

CFM_30.speaker: Wyll
CFM_30.text: You said devils only. She was a tiefling, not a monster.
CFM_30.context: NodeContext: Upset. He's been lied to.

CFM_75.speaker: Mizora
CFM_75.text: Clause G, Section Nine: 'Targets shall be limited to the infernal, the demonic, the heartless, and the soulless.'

CFM_3.speaker: Mizora
CFM_3.text: Cheer up, buttercup. Karlach had no heart. You did the world a favour.

CFM_29.speaker: Mizora
CFM_29.text: More to the point, you obeyed.

CFM_129.speaker: Player
CFM_129.text: Get on with it, devil. What do you want?

CFM_112.speaker: Player
CFM_112.text: Damn it all, Wyll. Why didn't you tell me about her?

CFM_118.speaker: Player
CFM_118.text: I've heard enough. You're not leaving this place alive.

CFM_42.context: CinematicNodeContext: Mizora makes a dramatic 'wiping' motion with her hands. Hellish magic fills the air.

CFM_40.context: CinematicNodeContext: Power surges through Wyll. He rises into the air, and then drops to his feet. He has been gifted a new devilish power.InternalNodeContext: Wyll gets a new power

CFM_74.speaker: Mizora
CFM_74.text: Always a pleasure. Shame that tadpole's gone and pissed on your party.

CFM_178.speaker: Mizora
CFM_178.text: But I'll be damned if it goes pissing on mine.

CFM_134.speaker: Mizora
CFM_134.text: I've got some errands to do - but don't you fret much, pup. I'll be back in three shakes of your tail.

CFM_146.speaker: Player
CFM_146.text: Godsdamned devil. Get out of my camp!

CFM_86.speaker: Mizora
CFM_86.text: Now? But I'm just getting comfy.

CFM_13.speaker: Player
CFM_13.text: That's a nice set of wings. Let me guess: Wyll's patron?

CFM_174.speaker: Mizora
CFM_174.text: Handler's the word, if it's all the same. Call me Mizora - your dear friend Wyll is my little puppy -

CFM_61.speaker: Mizora
CFM_61.text: You haven't introduced me to your friend. Where are your manners?
